name: tree-sitter-allium
description: Tree-sitter grammar for the Allium language.

scripts.build:native: node-gyp rebuild && mkdir -p dist && cp build/Release/tree_sitter_allium_binding.node dist/tree-sitter-allium.node
scripts.build:wasm: tree-sitter build --wasm && mkdir -p dist && mv tree-sitter-allium.wasm dist/
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run build:native && npm run build:wasm
